reviews.text: Have stayed 4 nights during September. Booked room 9 which was a good size with good bathroom with shower only which was fine with me. Good location with short walking distance to centeral train station. Did not have any problem with the insects because I have made sure windows are close when the lights are on. Very helpful owners which you feel them as your friends since long time.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and owner

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very near a good irish bar and it is easy to walk to all places.
reviews.title: Mosquito-ridden accomodations

likes.liked: — Good location, very hospitable staff who took the time to make restaurant recommendations (great restaurant!)
likes.disliked: — The mosquitos and the fact that they acted like this was normal and no problem
